## PR Checklist

- [ ] `manifest.yaml` is present and valid
- [ ] Linter passes (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] Archive is in the correct location (`archives/<name>-<version>.tar.gz`)
- [ ] `README.md` is included in the skill archive
- [ ] No sensitive data included
- [ ] Tests pass (`npm test`)

## Type of Change

- [ ] New skill submission
- [ ] Skill update / new version
- [ ] Catalog tooling / infrastructure
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] Documentation
